title: Strengthening Patient Care Practical Skills: Autonomy Support Training (AST) for Low-Skilled Supervisors

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain the three core elements of ASD (relatedness, autonomy, and competence).
Learners can apply three autonomy-supportive communication strategies in real-life supervisory scenarios.
Learners can design a feedback framework for motivating team members.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
